name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ALT AI: Add alt text to image descriptions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension Using AI-generated image descriptions to make the internet more accessible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Alt AI Chrome Plugin is an accessibility tool that adds Alt text to any page on the internet. Alt AI aims to improve the web experience for the visually impaired. 

Use the Alt AI Chrome Extension to automatically add Alt text to every image on a page, replacing any existing and inaccurate Alt descriptions. 

Screen readers will read out the Alt-AI-generated Alt text to give you a better understanding of whatâ€™s on the page.
